Title: Authorizes municipalities to adopt a local law authorizing the assessor of such municipality to accept late applications for the STAR exemption
Summary: Authorizes municipalities to adopt a local law authorizing the assessor of such municipality to accept applications for the basic STAR exemption and the enhanced STAR exemption for senior citizens after the taxable status date for such municipality and before January tenth of the following year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to applications for the enhanced school tax relief exemption for real property taxes
